entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 12:39 AM NDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:39 AM NDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero except minus 4 in low lying areas.
